definition: Tarim Basin depression in southern Xinjiang

li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
basin/flower pot/unit of volume equal to 12 斗[dou3] and 8 升[sheng1], approx 128 liters/CL:個|个[ge4]
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: China's Mystery Mummies takes viewers to the Tarim Basin.
sentences.chinese: 《中国神秘木乃伊》将带观众一访塔里木盆地。

sentences.english: Well Tazhong 11 was the discovery well of Silurian reservoirs in Tarim basin.
sentences.chinese: 塔中11井是塔里木盆地志留系产层的发现井。

sentences.english: The Southwest Tarim Basin belongs to Southwest Depression in regional structure.
sentences.chinese: 塔里木盆地西南地区，在区域构造上属西南坳陷。

sentences.english: Ancient land reason massif crick of iron lie in southwest predestination of tarim basin.
sentences.chinese: 铁克里克古陆缘地块位于塔里木盆地之西南缘。

sentences.english: There are favorable condition for formation of non anticlinal oil & gas pools in the Tarim Basin.
sentences.chinese: 塔里木盆地具备发育非背斜圈闭油气藏的条件。

sentences.english: The sandstone in Devonian Donghetang Formation is one of the main exploration stratigraphic horizons in Tarim Basin.
sentences.chinese: 东河塘组为塔里木盆地重要的勘探层位之一。

sentences.english: There are few studies about palaeozoic tensionalnormal fault of in Tarim Basin.
sentences.chinese: 目前对塔里木盆地古生代张性正断裂的研究尚少。

sentences.english: The predicting effects are very good to Carboniferous strata in southwest Tarim basin.
sentences.chinese: 在塔里木盆地西南地区石炭系地层中，预测效果良好。

sentences.english: A case study of reservoir in the Tarim basin is presented in the article.
sentences.chinese: 文中给出了在塔里木盆地储层研究中的应用实例。

sentences.english: There are 8 fault structural styles in Tarim Basin and its periphery.
sentences.chinese: 塔里木盆地及周缘发育八种断裂构造样式。

sentences.english: Kuche Depression, a foreland depression, is situated in the northen Tarim Basin.
sentences.chinese: 库车坳陷位于塔里木盆地北部，为一前陆坳陷。

sentences.english: Geothermal history of Tarim basin is closely related with its structural evolution history.
sentences.chinese: 塔里木盆地的地质热历史与其构造演化史密切相关。

sentences.english: Hetian paleo-uplift was found in Tarim Basin in the recent several years.
sentences.chinese: 和田古隆起是近几年在塔里木盆地新发现的古隆起。

sentences.english: The present paper deals with the Jurassic palynological assemblages from the northern margin in the Tarim Basin of Xinjiang, NW China.
sentences.chinese: 本文系统地研究了塔里木盆地北缘侏罗纪的孢子花粉。

sentences.english: Ake well 1 gas reservoir was found recently in the southwest depression of Talim Basin.
sentences.chinese: 阿克1井气藏是塔里木盆地西南坳陷新近发现的气藏。

sentences.english: The Kuluktak area is located at the northeastern margin of Tarim Basin.
sentences.chinese: 库鲁克塔格地区位于塔里木盆地东北缘。

pinyin: Ta3 ke4 la1 ma3 gan1 Sha1 mo4

definition: Tsaidam or Qaidam basin (Mongolian: salt marsh), depression northeast of the Plateau of Tibet, located between the Qilian Shan and the Kunlun Shan at the northern margin of the Tibetan Plateau.

pinyin: Gu3 er3 ban1 tong1 gu3 te4 Sha1 mo4

definition: Pamir high plateau on the border between Xinjiang and Tajikistan

pinyin: Ku4 mu3 ta3 ge2 Sha1 mo4

definition: Karakorum mountain range in west Xinjiang
the Tarim Basin in southern Xinjiang
Altai mountain range in Xinjiang and Siberia

Amu Darya, the biggest river of Central Asia, from Pamir to Aral sea, forming the boundary between Afghanistan and Tajikistan then flowing through Turkmenistan and Uzbekistan/formerly called Oxus by Greek and Western writers, and Gihon by medieval Islamic writers
Altai mountain chain on the border of Russia and Mongolia
Hexi Corridor (or Gansu Corridor), a string of oases running the length of Gansu, forming part of the Northern Silk Road
